name: directions
description:
The directions command calculates a route and generates human-readable turn-by-turn directions. It includes street names, turn instructions, and distances.

Supports multiple travel modes and output formats.

options.-m, --mode: Travel mode: drive, walk, bike (default: drive)

output:
Turn-by-turn directions including:
- Step number and instruction
- Street/road name
- Distance for each step
- Turn type (left, right, straight, etc.)
- Total distance and estimated time
